caseStudies.title: Lead React Software Developer
roles: Working with clients to develop the overall look and design of a website.
Convert PSD template to website code with programming languages React js, HTML5, CSS3
Creating, maintaining and modifying websites and UI using React js.
Creating reusable components using react js that could be used in future feature development.
Ensuring site accessibility across all platforms, including laptops and smartphones
Testing site for ease of use, speed and other quality factors such as browser compatibility and mobile responsiveness.
Fixing any site issues and bugs that may come up during testing.
Collaborated with graphic designer to come up with a functioning aesthetic website.
Maintaining brand consistency throughout the design of the website.
